mapper.insert: insert into board_mst values( 0, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{user_code}, #{board_type}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select bm.board_code, bm.board_title, bm.board_content, bm.user_code, bm.board_type,
bm2.total_count,
bm.create_date, bm.update_date FROM board_mst bm LEFT OUTER JOIN (select COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM board_mst) bm2 ON (1 = 1) where
board_type = 1
ORDER BY board_code desc LIMIT #{page}, #{totalCount}
